x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: During natural disasters or emergencies, coordination between local authorities, NGOs, and volunteers is often inefficient, delaying aid delivery.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A centralized ServiceNow platform that connects responders, NGOs, and donors. It tracks available resources, open needs, and ongoing operations in real time with map-based visualizations and automated task assignments.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Field Service Management
  • App Engine
  • CSDM
  • IntegrationHub (APIs for google maps)
  • Flow Designer 

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Maintaining data accuracy and connectivity during disaster events.
